long_description: Ideal for day trips, sightseeing and everyday use, the functional and fun PacSafe Slingsafe 300 GII daypack helps protect your valuable possessions from theft. Spacious enough to fit a13 in. laptop or tablet, water bottle, guidebook and valuables; you can relax knowing you have everything you need, all in 1 place. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into vulnerable areas to prevent thieves from slashing through the fabric. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is integrated into the adjustable carry strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at 1 end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture so nobody can walk off with your bag. Zippered main compartment with padded slip pocket; front zippered organizer pocket. Printed liner adds some fun; padded electronic pocket fits up to a 13 in. laptop or tablet. 2 water bottle/umbrella side pockets. Pacsafe Slingsafe 300 includes a pen holder and key clip.
short_description: Ideal for day trips, sightseeing and everyday use, the functional and fun PacSafe Slingsafe 300 GII daypack helps protect your valuable possessions from theft.
